column4: What does "chroot: cannot run command `/bin/bash': Exec format error" mean if I want to chroot into a mac-system?
it means it can't execute /bin/bash (probably because /bin/bash isn't on a mac system) so it's not emptied the chroot
launch the shell the mac uses
kriebel: There is a /media/mac/bin/bash and a -/bin/zsh
